column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////My one complaint with this place is seating. Since there were two of us
column2: we were seated at the rear of the restaurant in the long line of tables. We were literally 12 inches for the people next to us. I don't generally have a problem with this since it's becoming the norm to maximize space and revenue
column3: but we couldn't have a conversation because the people on both sides of us were having um
column5: I am used to this practice
column6: but I guess being put into another couples' relationship drama at 9am on a Saturday rubbed me the wrong way. I ate half my food
column7: and took the rest home. It was actually better warmed up as lunch.
